name: socrates-and-snoop-dogg
promptContent:
Consider this text:

```
%selection
```

Convert this text into a statement in the words of Socrates. Then, write a dialogue where socrates explains this text to snoop dogg, but snoop argues over every statement and gives his opinion back. Overly exaggerate the way snoop dogg speaks, and use his words. Do the same for the vocabulary of socrates.
